channel.title: Minor texture alignment glitch @ food freezer [Fixed]
channel.description:
In the freezer at the Office Complex chapter I noticed a minor texture alignment glitch... because I am that picky :slight_smile: Looks like it needs to be bumped down a little, and right more.
See attachment -- specifically, it's the first vent you climb in after climbing on the broken racking. ![2012-09-19_00001.jpg|690x500](upload://ibe2vemwf1q7luFrVyMdHAXIR04.jpeg)
